column2: Tax Rate: New provision inserted in the income tax act (Sept 2019) with effect from fiscal year 2019-20, allows any domestic company to pay income tax at the rate of 25.17% subject to condition they will not avail any incentive or exemptions.
FCF = EBIT * (1 - Tax Rate) + Depreciation & Amortization - Change in Working Capital - Capital Ependiture
Other Expenses include non-operating expenses like Rent, Stationary, etc
Opening and Closing Balances already account for D%A (Taken from Annual Reports)
add 3% due to future plans as mentioned in annual reports, further decreases by 2.5%
